title: Javed Akhtar slams his AI generated video: I am seriously considering to report
description: Veteran lyricist Javed Akhtar said a viral video claiming he “turned to God” is AI-generated and fake. He warned of legal action, saying such content harms reputation, and may approach cyber police against those responsible and sharing it

title: Instagram Chief Adam Mosseri warns online authenticity is at risk amid AI Boom
description: Instagram Chief Adam Mosseri warns about "infinite synthetic content" stealing the authenticity.

title: Google leads in agentic AI
description: The NBT in AI is said to happen when the tech can carry out actions and not just produce words – agentic AI. According to Gartner, the leader in the ...The post Google leads in agentic AI appeared first on Electronics Weekly.

title: 'Unacceptable': Priyanka Chaturvedi Flags Misuse Of AI Grok Feature Targeting Women Photos, Writes To Ashwini Vaishnaw

title: The dark side of how kids are using AI
description: Children are increasingly using AI chatbots for companionship to act out violent and sexual role-play, a new report from a digital security firm has found.Aura’s 2025 State of the Youth survey revealed that AI chats “may not just be playful back-and-forths” but “places where kids talk about...
